name: ECR: Container Registry for Docker images
ECR: Container registry, automated image scanning and reporting
Bourne Leisure independent network IP addressing and allocations
S3 buckets: IAC secure remote state backend, Spinnaker persistent storage
Spinnaker: Continuous delivery platform (running in EKS)
Jenkins (master on EC2, slaves on Kubernetes)
Hal (tool for managing spinnaker. Deployed on EC2)
